author: الوطن
title: Ground News - Osama Kamal: We take pride in the memory of Martyrs' Day as a lesson, patriotism and honor
text:
Summary by الوطن Journalist Osama Kamal stressed that the Egyptian martyr was the soldier and officer who stood to protect the border and liberated the land from terrorism from the dastardly enemy, stressing that Egypt is dear to its people Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
